name: Boss Breeder
description:
DISCLAIMER OR SOMETHING: Make sure to hit Fullscreen. There seems to be a bug with our WebGL resolution in the project and Itch.io viewport. 🙃

Combine two similar creatures to breed stronger and stronger bosses. Move fast so you don’t get overwhelmed by skeletons before breeding the ULTIMATE END BOSS.

Using mouse as a controller. 

Gotta catch em all!

Creators:
Artist: Elinor Hägg,  Twitter: @elinorhagg
Programmer: Gustaf Lindqvist, Twitter: @GLindqvist
